entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 8 AOT Published files Windows run with environment variable do not work #107227
  • Secondary frame stackoverflow test failure on linux #107226
  • CS0234 is incorrectly detected during the compilation of Razor files in Blazor. #107223
  • HashSet<string> breaks if copied from one using non-singleton default equality comparer #107222

Closed

  • Oo #107228
  • Inefficient code gen when switching from direct array to Span<T> or Memory<T> #107181

PullRequests

Created

  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Pass $(crossArg) to src/tests/build.sh in Antigen/Fuzzlyn pipelines #107229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    area-Build-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2528534 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI][draft] UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute on the API surface #107185
    api-needs-work, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics #107207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add TypeNameFuzzer #107206
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Remove PointerNativeTypeAssignmentRewriter by introducing a separate local with the exact type and assigning to/from it #107219
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
